message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, considering the significant benefits this product can bring to your business. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discounted price, it's still slightly above what I'm comfortable with at this point. Considering the product's value to me, I'd be willing to pay $800000. This is a fair price that reflects the potential benefits we both stand to gain from this deal.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To better align with your expectations while still ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction, I am proposing a revised price of $850000 for the product. This price reflects the product's value and the benefits it can provide to your business. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable and look forward to your feedback.
